mapper.delete: UPDATE shop SET status=0 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET name= #{name} ,addr= #{addr} , #{addrd} , phon= #{phon} ,logo= #{logo} ,info= #{info} ,allmin= #{allmin} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop WHERE id=#{id} AND status != 0
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET status=#{status} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT s.id, s.name , s.bnum, s.addr, s.addrd, s.phon FROM shop s INNER JOIN menu m ON m.sid = s.id INNER JOIN mncate c ON m.cid = c.id WHERE c.id = #{cid};

select.if: SELECT DISTINCT s.id, s.name , s.bnum, s.addr, s.addrd, s.phon, s.logo, s.status FROM shop s INNER JOIN menu m ON m.sid = s.id INNER JOIN mncate c ON m.cid = c.id INNER JOIN marker mk ON mk.id = s.marker WHERE (mk.latt BETWEEN #{latt}-0.027 AND #{latt}+0.027) AND (mk.logt BETWEEN #{logt}-0.027/COS(RADIANS(#{latt})) AND #{logt}+0.027/COS(RADIANS(#{latt}))) AND s.status != 0
